title: Side Panels

body.body: Warning - General - Stabilise Motorcycle - including DO NOT support on non integral parts
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
Do not support the motorcycle on any ancillary component, the exhaust system or any other non structural parts of the motorcycle frame.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall resulting in motorcycle damage, serious injury or death.
Side Panels removal DV; DVX; DVY; DW; DW4; DX4
Notice - Left and Right - Same Procedure
Follow the same procedure for both left and right hand sides.

To remove either side panel, grasp the panel firmly in both hands and pull the lower edge of the panel away from the motorcycle until the spigot clears the retaining grommet (leaving the grommet in place).
Slide the side panel rearwards and lift the side panel clear of the locating tangs.
To refit, align the side panel locating slots to the locating tangs on the airbox from the rear and slide the side panel towards the front of the motorcycle.
Firmly push the spigot into the grommet on the airbox.
Gently pull on the top edge of the side panel to ensure it is secured to the airbox.

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: DVY; DW4; DX4; DW; DVX; DV
